Treeverse LIVE on Play Store & Epic Games

Treeverse is finally live on Google Play Store (Android) and Epic Games (Windows) with iOS in the works. Download it now, play and share with your friends!

Endless Clouds
Mar 12, 2025
27

Endless Clouds Updates
Treeverse LIVE on Play Store & Epic Games
3

Share

WE ARE OFFICIALLY LIVE ON PLAY STORE AND EPIC GAMES!

You can now find Treeverse on the Google Play Store (Android) and Epic Games (Windows)! We are still in the process of App Store for iOS.

You can download now and start playing across multiple servers!

Keep in mind the reward campaign has not begun. Details on that will be provided on all of our official announcement channels ahead of time. However the build will be the same so you can get a feel of things by playing it now.

This is a major step and would love for you to share it online and talk about it. We will interact and repost all Treeverse content.

We still have so much more to build and improve: game design, fundamental progression systems, mounts, pets, guilds, main quest storyline, side quests, pvp, improved content, more dungeons/items/weapons/zones, etc... — this is your first time into the world of Treeverse so cherish this experience and witness the growth alongside us.

Play Store

Epic Games

FAQ

Will we be rewarded for playing this game?

There will be a reward campaign announced very soon so keep an eye on official announcements! There are no rewards before the campaign begins.

Will the data be reset?

Yes, all data will be reset before the reward campaign.

Can I play this game on Mac?

No. We currently support downloads on Play Store and Epic Games with App Store coming soon.

Will I be able to use my NFTs in game?

For the time being we do not support existing NFTs. Expect to be able to use them in future releases.

I have a grey screen of death, what do I do?

We do not support VPNs so that may be causing it. If you face any other issues, join our Discord and let us know!

Where can I stay updated?

Please join our Discord to be the first to hear when new announcements drop. And subscribe to our Substack.
